page.title: 07INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: {..Interesting People.. Why did you choose to live with animals?{Because I've always liked {them.}Could you explain a bit about your voluntary work with animals,how you come to get them & what you do when you get these poor little creatures.{I take in cruelty cases, {sometimes they are the subject of {prosecution,because I have the {facilities I am asked to take in the {bigger cases,i.e.goats,pigs,sheep, {horses,ponies,donkeys etc.,the small {animals are those that cross my path, {cats,kittens,birds,squirrels etc.What {I try to do is to return them to the {wild when they are cured I don't like {penning any creature...}From this lady the teenagers of the village also benefit. She finds employment on a casual basis for them,not only finding them something to do,interesting them.
